qas.question: What did the Tuvalu government assess after Cyclone Pam?
What event on Tuvalu made assistance to the population necessary?
What assistance did many international groups give to Tuvalu?
For what action was government assistance necessary after the Tuvalu cyclone??

context: The Tuvalu Government carried out assessments of the <a0_0>damage<a0_0/> caused by <a1_0>Cyclone Pam<a1_0/> to the islands and has provided medical aid, food as well as assistance for the <a3_0>cleaning-up<a3_0/> of storm debris. Government and Non-Government Organisations provided assistance technical, funding and material support to Tuvalu to assist with <a2_0>recovery<a2_0/>, including WHO, UNICEF, UNDP, OCHA, World Bank, DFAT, New Zealand Red Cross & IFRC, Fiji National University and governments of New Zealand, Netherlands, UAE, Taiwan and the United States.
